product_name: Swix VR50 Violet Fluorinated Hard Kick Wax - 45g
long_description: Swix VR50 violet fluorinated hard kick wax is designed for moist to dry snow around freezing. When used below freezing, high humidity is required. Ideal for new fallen snow from +1degC to -2degC (34degF to 28degF) and for old, fine-grained snow from 0degC to -5degC (32degF to 23degF). Fresh snow is characterized by sharp crystals with relatively strong penetration capacity. Older snow is characterized by crystals that are rounded off and have less penetration power.
short_description: Swix VR50 violet fluorinated hard kick wax is designed for moist to dry snow around freezing. When used below freezing, high humidity is required.
